name: DockBot
description:
A high-stakes game of packing and shipping. Created in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 37. #OneRoom

The next shipment for Sub-surface colony H1-S9L has been teleported in, but the crates have arrived out of order. As Dock bot cR-8x, search through the crates by taking samples to find like elements and then deliver them to the distributor. But if you contaminate your sample, you'll have to get a new one.

Action button is "Q".
